author: nero_eth
content:
I fixed some smaller things in the specs these days, bugs that were correct in the EIP but not in the execution-specs. 
Still, there's one thing that was not specified enough in the EIP, self-destructs within the same transaction.

Those deleted accounts are included in the BAL with nonce = 0 and balance = 0. This is the signal for a in-transaction self destruct. 
PR here:
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10383
